basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time 2-3 days
basic.color: Leaf will turn pink red with sufficient sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Half shade in summer dormancy, enough sunlight in other seasons
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry and reduce water in summer and winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
